html:
1.24.19  2:16 am   what is melted chocolate

     hot brown goo

1.24.19  12:15 am   how to write an explanatory essay?

     take something, and then explain the hell out of it

1.24.19  12:11 am   What's the reason for you to make a YouTube channel?

     pressure from society

1.23.19  11:29 pm   what, do you believe is a helpful guide to living life to the fullest?

     the i ching

1.23.19  11:22 pm   thoughts on second quantization?

     it's focked

1.23.19  11:14 pm   what is the true noise of the ocean

     sounds like water

1.23.19  11:14 pm   do the songs you make come to you randomly with no context?

     no

1.23.19  11:11 pm   i admire that you take time out of your day to answer fan's questions, so i just wanted to say thank you for your songs, they really calmed me throughout my hectic  day. you have a great voice, have you considered making a album instead of releasing singles?:)

     yes but i strongly prefer doing the songs individually

1.23.19  11:03 pm   Have you noticed that a seemingly abnormally large portion of questions you answer are asked in the late night/early morning?

     no

      If so, do you think there's a particular reason for this?

     no, and i don't think it's true, but i've noticed between 4 and 9 am seems to be the slowest time, and the busiest times tend to be anywhere between 3pm and 1am

1.23.19  10:57 pm   how can i make more videos that i find enjoyable i dont know where to go from here

     watch many other videos, and then check out many other things that aren't videos. and go on some small to medium sized journeys. keep a note-taking device handy

1.23.19  10:56 pm   are you still a piece of garbage?

     i felt like it for 2 days in 2007

      if you are can i join you in the journey to find the point of life outside this never ending universe of questions and conflicts?

     maybe

1.23.19  10:55 pm   r u edgy and/or cool? it's for a science project

     it's nice to combine the edge and the middle, and then temperate it to a crisp / average temperature

1.23.19  10:44 pm   Why do bagels have holes?

     so you can hang them on a bagel rack

1.23.19  10:37 pm   would you consider going on tour?

     yes

1.23.19  10:34 pm   Do you like the sound of rain?

     yes

1.23.19  10:31 pm   What do you think about all these people trying to ask you existential questions?

     they are likely to be somewhat existential people

1.23.19  10:29 pm   What were you trying to do with the chair in the 2008 video you posted on the Reality page? (If you remember)

     turn it upside down, i think

1.23.19  10:25 pm   Should I buy friends or should friends buy me?

     it should be a dynamic negotiation process

1.23.19  10:24 pm   Do you believe your work should be studied? Or just enjoyed? I guess for some that is one in the same 

     each person may have their own way of dealing with it

1.23.19  10:22 pm   pretend like this is a surrealist question?

     ok i shall

1.23.19  10:20 pm   do you think you will take a lot more opportunities for interview after your h3h3 podcast appearance and your genius video?

     yes

1.23.19  10:17 pm   Hey Bill, heres something cool. if you pour an energy drink in a water filter, everything in the drink is filtered and it turns into water. idk i just thought it was cool. what do you think?

     i'm interested to know what you are going to do with all the energy you've extracted during the process

1.23.19  10:13 pm   Do you like looking at the vastness of the internet and its many memes? like you probably get this question a lot but when your out in public and someone says or does something thats a meme and you think "haha, oh yeah i know that and its pretty funny." do you think thats your kind of entertainment?

     sure
1.23.19  9:58 pm   What color is opposite of grey?

1.23.19  9:26 pm   Why is your anagrams page labeled 'scramble', but the URL is 'http://billwurtz.com/anagrams/anagrams.html'?

     the URL is to describe what i think the page actually is. the label is 'scramble' because i think that is a more friendly term for the general public. i've found that most people seem to actually think 'anagram' means either an acronym (N.Y.P.D.) or an acrostic poem (Nice, Youthful, Personable, Daring). and the reason the letters of 'scramble' are arranged/colorized the way they are is to fit in with the general stylings of the rest of the title pages on the site

1.23.19  8:25 pm   Should I worry about my highschool GPA?

     it depends if you are planning on joining any societies who value that sort of thing. even if so, try to spend more time working on it than worrying

1.23.19  8:18 pm   how did you get all of the song you do on youtube

     i pushed them gently onto the site

1.23.19  8:16 pm   how can you be happy

     i think it is inevitable at some point

1.23.19  8:03 pm   Your music can be played on Amazon Echo Dot. Did you know this?

     that's good to hear. special thanks to all the echo/alexa users who helped make sure this works

1.23.19  7:52 pm   What have you created that you are most proud of?

     the fat guy in a little coat arrangement

1.23.19  7:45 pm   What were we watching while on the blimp?

     i think it was part of 'movie star'

1.23.19  7:26 pm   Why are you not funny? :D

     because of the serious nature of our world

1.23.19  7:17 pm   Have you ever tried 60fps sequences? It's like adding a whole new layer of reality...I'm a bit addicted to it

     i have never tried it, but it would make things take a lot longer, and there are other techniques that i would like to start doing more which also would make things take longer but i would be more likely to incorporate them first, because they make much much more of a difference than the frame rate

1.23.19  6:01 pm   what is porridge?

     a type of mush, i suspect

1.23.19  6:00 pm   Do you think World War II ever actually ended? Like we're not still throwing nukes but it seems like current conflicts are just fanning the cold-war coals back into flame.  

     both true, but those are 2 different wars

1.23.19  5:22 pm   What does god mean?

     everything

1.23.19  5:03 pm   What about making a song about the Yellowstone volcanos? Since it's now about to blow up?

     i already did a volcano song

1.23.19  3:02 pm   I'm at school. Is this a waste of time?

     in some ways maybe

1.23.19  2:41 pm   Do you ever feel the urge to jump up and down when hearing a nice song

     yes

1.23.19  2:15 pm   is China real?

     yes, and more

1.23.19  12:43 pm   How many hats do you have?

     i am hat

1.23.19  9:59 am   Can you give us any hints as to what your next video will be,

     no

      or do we just have to wait for you to finish and upload the song?

     yes

1.23.19  8:23 am   is there a point in the universe besides housing life?

     no

      who is god,

     not necessarily

      what did he emerge from?

     it's surely much more than a 'he'

      does god have a house?

     is house

      what does it look like?

     look around you

      does god trim bushes while Jesus knocks on the door with other gods on the front porch saying "yo god you forgot about the front bushes" and they all help him garden?

     in the hollywood version, yes

      these are questions that dwell in the depths of my mind.

     it sounds like they are coming from the surface

1.23.19  7:04 am   Which holiday would you like to eliminate?

     elimination day

1.23.19  5:34 am   what do you think love is?

     you

1.23.19  4:12 am   Why don't you make lyricless songs more often? I'm not suggesting, just genuinely wondering

     lyricless music tends to work best in ways that are not necessarily a 'song'

1.23.19  1:28 am   say you think that only the environment has influence on your decisions. would there be a point to apologizing, if nothing is truly your fault?

     what if i am someone else's environment

1.22.19  11:46 pm   how can i learn to express myself in a more creative and interesting way?

      go on some interesting adventures, even just in your local neighborhood

1.22.19  11:06 pm   Thoughts on religion?

Thoughts on atheism?

     they are 2 important components of ismism

1.22.19  10:38 pm   Are forks just badly made spoons?

     no
